name: Alexander + Tom
description:
Digital expertise and world-class design. Alex + Tom has been an award-winning interactive marketing team for over 15 years.
Alex + Tom, Inc. combines sophisticated interactive multimedia design and usability with advanced software development and integration to provide engaging, productive applications for the private and public sectors. Our expertise in the most advanced internet, programming, and database technologies allows us to rapidly deliver websites and software applications that solve the critical needs of our clients.
Founded in 1996 and named for the communication innovators Alexander Graham Bell and Thomas Edison, Alexander & Tom helps change the way the world communicates. Not only do we provide the marketing strategy, development, and design essential to any good communication, but also the business logic, programming, and reporting necessary to measure results. We specialize in invention over convention, always searching for new ideas and approaches, fueled by the application of new technology and new approaches.
READ MORE...
